languages.text: "Обнаруженные данные не поддаются прочтению. Они зашифрованы, но лишь частично, и я выдвигаю гипотезу, что херетек Деменц занимался их дешифровкой. Я приложу все усилия, чтобы извлечь больший объем данных. Информация, указывающая на единицу, определяемую как "увечный охотник", предположительно обладает критической значимостью".

"The data discovered is unreadable. It is encrypted, albeit only partially, and I hypothesise that the heretek Dementz was attempting to decrypt it. I will take every effort to extract a larger volume of data. Information pointing to the unit referred to as the 'Maimed Hunter' is alleged to be of critical significance."
languages.original_text: "Обнаруженные данные не поддаются прочтению. Они зашифрованы, но лишь частично, и я выдвигаю гипотезу, что херетек Деменц занимался их дешифровкой. Я приложу все усилия, чтобы извлечь больший объем данных. Информация, указывающая на единицу, определяемую как "увечный охотник", предположительно обладает критической значимостью".

I will take every effort to extract a larger volume of data. Information pointing to the unit referred to as the 'Maimed Hunter' is alleged to be of critical significance."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

I will take every effort to extract a larger volume of data. Information pointing to the unit referred to as the 'Maimed Hunter' is alleged to be of critical significance."

I will take every effort to extract a larger volume of data. Information pointing to the unit referred to as the 'Maimed Hunter' is alleged to be of critical significance."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我只发现了无法读取的数据。这些数据是加密过的，不过只加密了一部分，我猜测异端分子德曼兹当时正打算将它解密。我会采取一切必要手段获得更多数据。我推测，关于‘残损猎手’这个单位的信息，将会发挥至关重要的作用。”
languages.original_text: "The data discovered is unreadable. It is encrypted, albeit only partially, and I hypothesise that the heretek Dementz was attempting to decrypt it. I will take every effort to extract a larger volume of data. Information pointing to the unit referred to as the 'Maimed Hunter' is alleged to be of critical significance."

traits.locale_text: “我只发现了无法读取的数据。这些数据是加密过的，不过只加密了一部分，我猜测异教徒德曼兹当时正打算将它解密。我会采取一切必要手段获得更多数据。我推测，关于‘残损猎手’这个单位的信息，将会发挥至关重要的作用。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Los datos descubiertos son ilegibles. Están encriptados parcialmente y tengo la hipótesis de que el heretek Dementz estaba intentando desencriptarlos. Necesitaré esforzarme para extraer más datos. Presuntamente, la información relacionada con la unidad "Cazador lisiado" es de vital importancia».
languages.original_text: "The data discovered is unreadable. It is encrypted, albeit only partially, and I hypothesise that the heretek Dementz was attempting to decrypt it. I will take every effort to extract a larger volume of data. Information pointing to the unit referred to as the 'Maimed Hunter' is alleged to be of critical significance."

traits.locale_text: «Los datos descubiertos son ilegibles. Están encriptados parcialmente y tengo la hipótesis de que el heretek Dementz estaba intentando desencriptarlos. Necesitaré esforzarme para extraer más datos. Presuntamente, la información relacionada con la unidad "Cazador lisiado" es de vital importancia».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「発見されたデータは読解不能だ。部分的ではあるが暗号化されており、異端技術デメンツが解読を試みたものと推測される。より多くのデータを抽出するため、あらゆる努力をするつもりだ。「不具の狩人」と呼ばれるユニットを示す情報は、極めて重要な意味を持つと思われる」
languages.original_text: "The data discovered is unreadable. It is encrypted, albeit only partially, and I hypothesise that the heretek Dementz was attempting to decrypt it. I will take every effort to extract a larger volume of data. Information pointing to the unit referred to as the 'Maimed Hunter' is alleged to be of critical significance."

traits.locale_text: 「発見されたデータは読解不能だ。部分的ではあるが暗号化されており、異端技術デメンツが解読を試みたものと推測される。より多くのデータを抽出するため、あらゆる努力をするつもりだ。「不具の狩人」と呼ばれるユニットを示す情報は、極めて重要な意味を持つと思われる」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die entdeckten Daten sind unleserlich. Sie sind verschlüsselt, wenn auch nur teilweise, und ich stelle die Hypothese auf, dass der Häretekt Dementz versucht hat, sie zu entschlüsseln. Ich werde alle Anstrengungen unternehmen, eine größere Menge an Daten zu extrahieren. Informationen über die als 'verstümmelter Hunter' bezeichnete Einheit sind von kritischer Bedeutung."
languages.original_text: "The data discovered is unreadable. It is encrypted, albeit only partially, and I hypothesise that the heretek Dementz was attempting to decrypt it. I will take every effort to extract a larger volume of data. Information pointing to the unit referred to as the 'Maimed Hunter' is alleged to be of critical significance."

traits.locale_text: "Die entdeckten Daten sind unleserlich. Sie sind verschlüsselt, wenn auch nur teilweise, und ich stelle die Hypothese auf, dass der Häretekt Dementz versucht hat, sie zu entschlüsseln. Ich werde alle Anstrengungen unternehmen, eine größere Menge an Daten zu extrahieren. Informationen über die als 'verstümmelter Hunter' bezeichnete Einheit sind als kritischer Bedeutung anzusehen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Les données découvertes sont illisibles. Elles sont en partie chiffrées, et j'ai pour théorie que l'hérétek Dementz tentait de les décrypter. Je vais redoubler d'efforts pour extraire une plus grande quantité de données. Les informations relatives à l'unité surnommée le "Chasseur mutilé" seraient apparemment d'une importance capitale. »
languages.original_text: "The data discovered is unreadable. It is encrypted, albeit only partially, and I hypothesise that the heretek Dementz was attempting to decrypt it. I will take every effort to extract a larger volume of data. Information pointing to the unit referred to as the 'Maimed Hunter' is alleged to be of critical significance."

traits.locale_text: « Les données découvertes sont illisibles. Elles sont en partie chiffrées, et j'ai pour théorie que l'hérétek Dementz tentait de les décrypter. Je vais redoubler d'efforts pour extraire une plus grande quantité de données. Les informations relatives à l'unité surnommée le "Chasseur mutilé" seraient apparemment d'une importance capitale. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "The data discovered is unreadable. It is encrypted, albeit only partially, and I hypothesise that the heretek Dementz was attempting to decrypt it. I will take every effort to extract a larger volume of data. Information pointing to the unit referred to as the 'Maimed Hunter' is alleged to be of critical significance."

languages.text: "Keşfedilen veri okunamıyor. Kısmen şifreli. Tekâfir Dementz'in deşifre etme teşebbüsünde bulunduğu hipotezini yürütmekteyim. Daha büyük miktarda veri çıkarmak için her türlü eforu sarf edeceğim. Birime 'Yaralı Avcı' şeklinde atıfta bulunulmasının kritik öneme sahip olduğu görüşündeyim."
languages.original_text: "The data discovered is unreadable. It is encrypted, albeit only partially, and I hypothesise that the heretek Dementz was attempting to decrypt it. I will take every effort to extract a larger volume of data. Information pointing to the unit referred to as the 'Maimed Hunter' is alleged to be of critical significance."

traits.locale_text: "Keşfedilen veri okunabilir değil, şifreli. Kısmen ama. Bu yüzden de tekâfir Dementz'in bu şifreyi çözme teşebbüsünde bulunduğu hipotezini yürütmekteyim. Daha büyük miktarda veri çıkarmak için her türlü eforu sarf edeceğim. Birime 'Yaralı Avcı' şeklinde atıfta bulunulmasının kritik bir öneme sahip olduğu görüşündeyim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
